description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Physical description: 22 lines per page. Written in thick medium small taʻlīq in black ink with use of red. Occasional annotation on the margin. Fol. 297a-301b, 305a-b: Blank. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "Thānī 385". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "972/2 ḥāʼ". Traces of a now wanting horizontal label on the fore-edge flap, with title in Arabic. Origin: Copy completed on 1 Ṣafar 1249 [June 20, 1833] by Dāwud Ḥajjīw ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad (colophon, fol. 390a). Incipit: كتاب البيع قال شيخنا ابن الحجر فى شرح المنهاج Explicit: ونحو ذلك وهو ظاهر جدا فليتامل ... والله اعلم نجز تعليقها على يد جامعها فقير رحمة لربه منصور سبط الشيخ الطبلاوى الشافعى ... واتفق ذلك فى يوم الاربع المبارك التاسع من شهر ربيع الاول من شهور سنة الف من الهجرة النبوية
author: Ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī, Aḥmad, -approximately 1585
abstract: Part 3 (see colophon, fol. 390a) of a commentary on Tuḥfat al-muḥtāj, a summary and commentary by Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī on Minhāj al-ṭālibīn by Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī (d. 676/1278), on Shāfiʻī fiqh, collected by Manṣūr Sibṭ al-Shaykh al-Ṭablāwī (see end of text, fol. 390a). The copy comprises the text from Kitāb al-bīʻ to the end.
extent: 390 leaves : paper ; 208 x 173 (160 x 125) mm. bound to 215 x 180 mm.

title.@value: [Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Tuḥfat al-muḥtāj bi-sharḥ al-Minhāj taʼlīf Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī].

dlme_title_ara_latn: [Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Tuḥfat al-muḥtāj bi-sharḥ al-Minhāj taʼlīf Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī].
provenance: Buying statement (from the heirs of Dāwud Ḥajjīw al-Chūkhī, Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1270 [Dec. 1853]) and waqf statement by Imām Shamīl ("al-Imām Shamwīl"), dated 1270 H. [1853 or 4], with his seal. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: Buying statement (from the heirs of Dāwud Ḥajjīw al-Chūkhī, Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1270 [Dec. 1853]) and waqf statement by Imām Shamīl ("al-Imām Shamwīl"), dated 1270 H. [1853 or 4], with his seal. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī, Aḥmad, -approximately 1585
ابن قاسم العبادي، احمد
subject: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, ca. 1503-ca. 1566—Tuḥfat al-muḥtāj bi-sharḥ al-Minhāj.
